name: Generate an inference unit evaluation report

steps.name: Given a valid, preconfigured inference unit for image classification with sub models
And a uuid unique_identifier_this for the inference unit evaluation
And an evaluation plan file for an image classification inference unit with sub models with report specification
And we read the evaluation plan
And the report specification in the evaluation plan contains title Inference Unit Evaluation Report
And the report specification in the evaluation plan contains filename report.pdf
And the report specification in the evaluation plan contains section types
And the report specification in the evaluation plan contains section titles
When we run inference unit evaluation
Then the generated evaluation report contains 3 performance summary table sections
Then the generated evaluation report contains 3 confusion matrix sections
Then the titles of the report and sections match the report specification in the evaluation plan
Then the specified dataset reference is in the report
Then the specified uuid is in the report

fullName: It must be possible to assess that an image classification inference unit with sub models behaves as intended: Generate an inference unit evaluation report

labels.name: feature
labels.value: It must be possible to assess that an image classification inference unit with sub models behaves as intended
